name: Microsoft Azure Sentinel
description: This plugin is used to ingest data to Microsoft Azure Sentinel platform. To access the plugin, you would need the Log Analytics Workspace on Microsoft Azure Sentinel platform.

configuration.label: Workspace ID
configuration.description: Unique identifier of your Azure Sentinel Workspace.

configuration.label: Primary Key
configuration.description: An authentication key for your Azure Sentinel Workspace.

configuration.label: Alerts Log Type Name
configuration.description: Custom Log Type name for alerts. Based on this name, schema for alerts will be created in Log Analytics Workspace with suffix '_CL'.

configuration.label: Events Log Type Name
configuration.description: Custom Log Type name for events. Based on this name, schema for events will be created in Log Analytics Workspace with suffix '_CL'.

configuration.label: WebTX Log Type Name
configuration.description: Custom Log Type name for web transactions. Based on this name, schema for web transactions will be created in Log Analytics Workspace with suffix '_CL'.
